page.title: 14Services to Dinas School
page.content: These people visit our school every day-the{postman,}the{school {cleaners}the{cook,assistant cook}and the{dinner-time lady helper. Each Wednesday afternoon the {rubbish collecting men}come. There are four different{food {deliveries}to school each week- frozen foods,vegetables,meat and groceries. A man comes to{test}the{water } about every three weeks. The{library}van calls once a term. Occasionally the{grass-cutting}man comes,the man to see if the school {needs any repairs}and the{men to do the{repairs. } The{dentist,doctor}and{nurse}come too.
